dcterms:description: A dataset containing transaction records from the Shanghai Metro system, used for predicting metro ridership. It includes data on passenger entry and exit at 288 stations over a period of time.
dcterms:title: SHMetro

dcterms:creator: L. Liu

dcterms:description: A dataset containing transaction records from the Hangzhou Metro system, used for predicting metro ridership. It includes data on passenger entry and exit at 80 stations over a period of time.
dcterms:title: HZMetro
